ARABIC: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لِّيَكُونُوا۟ لَهُمْ عِزًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They have taken other gods besides Allah to be a source of power and strength for them!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They have taken other gods apart from God that they might be a strength to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They have taken other gods instead of Allah that they may be a source of strength for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have sought honor from other gods instead of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they have chosen Gods besides Allah, so that they may provide them strength!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they have taken gods besides Allah, that they might give them honor, power and glory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they have taken gods besides Allah, that they should be to them a source of strength;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they have taken to them other gods apart from God, that they might be for them a might.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they have chosen (other) gods beside Allah that they may be a power for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They have taken other deities besides God, so that they may be a source of strength for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they have taken gods beside Allah that they might be unto them a glory. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They have taken gods besides Allah that they may be a [source of] might to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they have taken (for worship) gods other than Allah, to give them power and glory!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they have taken (for worship) aliha (gods) besides Allah, that they might give them honour, power and glory (and also protect them from Allah's Punishment etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they have taken gods, other than Allah, that they might be a power from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they took, besides God, other gods, to be for them a source of strength.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:81] And they, namely, the disbelievers of Mecca, have taken besides God, graven images [as], [other] gods, for them to worship, that they may be for them a [source of] might, [that they may be] intercessors before God, so that they will not be chastised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they have chosen (other)) the people of Mecca worshipped (gods beside Allah) i.e. idols (that they may be a power for them) that they be a protection for them from Allah's chastisement.
